subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Rajon Rondo had 19 assists, tying a career playoff high, and Ray Allen scored 22 points as the Celtics evened their series with the Cavaliers at 1-1.
snippet: Rajon Rondo had 19 assists, tying a career playoff high, and Ray Allen scored 22 points as the Celtics evened their series with the Cavaliers at 1-1.
